position: Senior Engineer - Back End Process Development
name: Pragmatic Semiconductor
description: Pragmatic, due to continued growth, seeks a Senior Back-End Process Development Engineer with preferably a Bachelor's Degree or experience in semiconductor processes to lead the development of back-end wafer and die processes, successfully hand over operations, and contribute to a culture of health, safety, and continuous improvement in the North East England office, offering a highly competitive benefits package including Visa/relocation support.
